title: Minecraft1.11的怎么打彩色的浮空字？
author: yannan
txt_content:
1.11的纯净版，用命令方块打彩色的浮空字体【§】和【\\\u00a7】都不行
做地图，急用，求助，在线等。。
效果像这样的：

replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
http://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.co ... A.E6.96.87.E5.AD.97
召唤浮空文字

http://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.co ... 4.E5.88.97.E8.A1.A8
添加队伍，更改队伍颜色

replies.author: 清晨w
replies.txt_content:
/summon ArmorStand ~ ~2 ~ {Invisible:1b,NoGravity:1b,CustomName:"浮空文字",CustomNameVisible:1b}
然后可以试试我的样式代码输入Mod

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
chyx 发表于 2017-7-20 22:49
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:standing_sign 0 destroy {Text1:"{\"text\":\"CLICK ME\",\"clickEvent\":{\" ...
执行完了右键牌子 即可出来你要的cb
直接加颜色代码就可以了

replies.txt_content:
